text: allah pahala kala dæ numbala visvasa karanu yæyi ovuna ta pavasanu læbu vita apa veta pahala karanu læbu dæ api visvasa karannemu yæyi ovuhu pavasati. eya ta bahirin æti dæ ovuhu pratiksepa karati. eya (alkuranaya) ovun samanga æti dæ tahavuru karana bævin meya ma satyaya vanneya. ebævin “numbala visvasa vantayin va sitiyehu nam mita pera allah ge nabi varun va ghatanaya kale mandæ” yi asanu
